text: The official Flag of Ukraine is the flag of the European country, Ukraine. Adopted in 1991, It has two horizontal stripes, a blue one, and a yellow one. File:Volodymyr Zelensky and Nancy Pelosi during a Joint Meeting of Congress with flag of Ukraine signed by the defenders of Bakhmut (cropped).jpg|Nancy Pelosi unfolding a Ukrainian flag from the Battle of Bakhmut, at the end of Zelenskyy's speech in the United States Capitol, in December 2022 Category:National symbols of Ukraine Ukraine Category:Flags introduced in 1918
title: Flag of Ukraine
